posts.cooked:
Adani wins temporary injunction

11th Sept 2020: The Supreme Court has granted Adani a temporary injunction stopping our national spokesperson Ben Pennings doing and saying specific things in relation to the Carmichael coal project whilst Adani undertakes civil action on Ben, which could ultimately bankrupt his family.

We are a powerful and diverse movement that will NEVER back down to climate-wrecking corporate bullies.

In order to comply with the injunction we are temporarily pulling our website. BUT, we will be back, bigger and stronger than ever before.
